title: Proposal for amending the yield farming mechanics (3/5)
body:
PROPOSAL 3 - LIMITING THE NUMBER OF PNG POOLS
Proposal 3 does not depend on other proposals and can be voted separately.

PNG Pools should be limited to WBTC, ETH, USDT and DAI at the begining to help creating decent pool sizes. Once the liquidity amount exceeds a certain level, other PNG pairs can always be voted to be added.
author: 0xa6b6c7F2596BA2a2F51Cf2B415001F0a94646F31
